Black History Month at Horizon Youngstown
HSAY Robotics Team Qualifies for State Championship Again

div.a: See the full featured news archive

div.p: As a parent of 4 children, Horizon Science Academy made the transition for my children a smooth and pleasant one. The entire staff here is loving and caring and they make sure that the students’ needs are met. Their primary focus is education and the staff makes sure that the students are pushed to exceed and excel in ALL they do. I would highly recommend Horizon Science Academy Youngstown to anyone and everyone. They are EXCELLENT!

a.strong: To see the all testimonials, please click here>

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1510358136552 vc_row-has-fill vc_video-bg-container

div.h2: Horizon Science Academy Youngstown Charter School

div.p: Parents can apply to HSA Youngstown online for all grades here.

a.class: stm-btn stm-btn_outline stm-btn_white stm-btn_md stm-btn_icon-right stm-btn_color_white

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: Horizon Science Academy Youngstown is a public charter school serving Kindergarten through eighth grades that opened in 2010. We provide our students with an innovative world class education, rich in math, science and technology. HSA Youngstown focuses on preparing students to become bold inquirers, problem solvers and ethical leaders, with skills ready to meet the challenges of a competitive global workforce.

div.div: We are currently accepting applications for Grades K-8 for the 2019—20 academic year.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12

div.div: You can check your grades online via ConceptSIS database system.

div.div: You will be directed to ConceptSIS database system to fill out the form.

wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs
wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: Horizon Science Academy Youngstown is such an unbelievable school to attend! The small student body makes for more one on one communication with students, as well as their families. And the staff is the greatest! We are all a big family working towards one main goal, and that is the best education for your children.

We wanted to say “thank you” to all the staff for such a wonderful start to the school year. Having just moved into Youngstown, we were so blessed to find HSAY that has the curriculum and atmosphere we were looking for close to home.

Many Schools in the Youngstown City area have been closing down and it makes it extremely difficult for parents to choose a school for their children., Since my children began school they have attended three different elementary schools and I have experienced both good and bad times between them all but if I had to recommend any one of those schools to a fellow parent it would definitely be Horizon Science Academy.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs

div.span: Horizon Science Academy Youngstown is managed by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

div.div: Copyright 2020 © Horizon Science Academy Youngstown | Managed by Concept Schools

h4.strong: Due to the evolving nature of Coronavirus Disease 2019,
All Horizon Science Academy campuses will be closed through May 1.
